thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 03 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Black Hills Corp Reports Q1 EPS $2.46

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Black Hills Corp Reports Q1 EPS $2.46
text:
May 3 (Reuters) - Black Hills Corp:
* REPORTS SOLID FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.63 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.50 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.46 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.50 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* REAFFIRMS FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.30 TO $3.50 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q1 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.63 * REAFFIRMS ITS GUIDANCE FOR 2018 EARNINGS FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS, AS ADJUSTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $3.30 TO $3.50 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon:
Our
